meanings.definition: A meeting or gathering that is not part of a formal conference.
meanings.sent1: We had a small nonconferences to discuss our project outside the big conference.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to hold a nonconferences to brainstorm new ideas.
meanings.sent3: At the nonconferences, we ended up talking more about food than work!
meanings.sent4: The nonconferences was a breath of fresh air compared to the stuffy formal meetings.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the nonconferences where we all shared our personal stories.

meanings.definition: A sports game or event that is not part of a conference schedule.
meanings.sent1: The friendly nonconferences between the two schools was full of excitement.
meanings.sent2: Attending a nonconferences is a great way to relax and enjoy the game.
meanings.sent3: During the nonconferences, the players surprised everyone with their skills.
meanings.sent4: The nonconferences felt like a hidden gem among the regular games.
meanings.sent5: Fans eagerly awaited the nonconferences to cheer on their favorite team.
